title: Home
description: Guild Wars 2 Event Meta Timers, Trading Post tools, Chatcode Generator and the largest directory of fansites, YouTubers and streamers.

title: Directory
description: The largest directory of Guild Wars 2 related fansites, Trading Post tools, YouTubers and streamers.

title: Collections
description: Get a good overview of the total value of certain basic, rare and black lion weapon collections from Guild Wars 2.

title: Tickets
description: A tool that looks through the Guild Wars 2 Trading Post to find the actual value of a Black Lion Ticket.

title: GW2 Chatcode Generator
description: Generate chat codes for Guild Wars 2. You can even make it seem like weapons or armor have upgrades they should not be able to have. Or just make fun weapon names.

title: Guild Wars 2 Event Timer
description: Guild Wars 2 event timers with events from core, Heart of Thorns, Path of Fire, living world and current events.

title: Trading Post Calculator
description: Guild Wars 2 Trading Post calulator, to make sure you can make a profit, before you invest.

title: About
description: Behind the scenes of GW2 Ninja, how it came to be and how you can contribute to make it even better.

title: Hail Lord Colin!
description: Praise be the Lord Colin. May he bring precursors for all of us. Throw the exotics into that mystic toilet and maybe we will be the blessed ones.

title: Stream Tools for Streamlabs Chatbot and Nightbot
description: Generate Guild Wars 2 API commands for you to use in your chat. Commands such as: WvW kills, WvW matchup, server, PvP rank and more.
